title: Smart Data Models - Water Network Management base schema
description: Common NGSI-LD definitions for Water Network Management data models

demandCategory.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Allows base demands and time patterns to be assigned to other categories of users.

baseDemand.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. Baseline or average demand for the category. A sub-property of the Property 'demandCategory'.

demandPattern.description: Relationship. A relationship to the pattern of the 'demandCategory' property.

sourceCategory.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Description of the quality of source flow entering the network at a specific node.

sourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. A sub-property of the Property 'sourceCategory'

sourceQuality.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units: 'mg/L'. Baseline or average concentration (or mass flow rate) of source. A sub-property of the Property 'sourceCategory'. All units are accepted in [CEFACT](https://www.unece.org/cefact.html) code.

sourcePattern.description: Relationship. A relationship to the pattern pf the sourceCategory property

tag.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. An optional text string used to assign the pipe to a category, perhaps one based on age or material

status.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The dynamic state of the node. Enum:'OPEN, CLOSED, CV'

initialStatus.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The link status at the start of the simulation. Enum:'OPEN, CLOSED, CV'

valveType.description: Property. Type of valve according to valve categories. Enum:'FCV, GPV, PBV, PRV, PSV, TCV'

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

valveCurve.description: Relationship. Reference to the Curve where the valve is located.

flow.description: Property. Rate of flow from `startsAt` node to `endsAt` node, measured by a device at the link (pipe, valve or pump)

velocity.description: Property. Observed velocity in the link (pipe, valve or pump)

quality.description: Property. Observed quality in the network component

energyUse.description: Property. Observed energy use by the element of the network

pressure.description: Property. Observed pressure at the node (junction, tank or reservoir)

supply.description: Property. Observed supply at the node (junction, tank or reservoir)

head.description: Property. Observed head at the node (junction, tank or reservoir)

sourceMassInflow.description: Property.. Observed source mass inflow at the node (junction, tank or reservoir)

level.description: Property. Observed level in the element of the network
